Class SocialService

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.services.SocialService

public class SocialService
extends java.lang.Object

Handles activities related to social groups ingame such as the buddy list, legions, etc

Ben

deleteFriend

public static void deleteFriend(Player deleter,

Deletes two players from eachother's friend lists, and updates the database

Parameters:
deleter - Player deleting a friend
exFriend2Id - Object ID of the friend he is deleting
